Parameters: CharSequence: The description of the route, or null if none.
setDescription(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the user-visible description of this route. The route description describes the kind of destination represented by the route. It may be a user-supplied string, a model number or brand of device.

setVolumeMax(int).Description: Defines the maximum volume at which the playback associated with this route is performed (for user feedback purposes). This information is only used when the playback is not local.

Parameters: int: Delta to apply to the current volume
requestUpdateVolume(int).Description: Request an incremental volume update for this route.

setVolumeCallback(android.media.MediaRou.Description: Set a callback to be notified of volume update requests

Parameters: int: Resource ID of an icon drawable to use to represent this route
setIconResource(int).Description: Set an icon that will be used to represent this route. The system may use this icon in picker UIs or similar.

setPlaybackStream(int).Description: Defines over what stream type the media is presented.

setVolumeHandling(int).Description: Defines whether volume for the playback associated with this route is fixed (@B_android#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_VOLUME_FIXED_E@) or can modified (@B_android#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_VOLUME_VARIABLE_E@).

Parameters: Drawable: icon drawable to use to represent this route
setIconDrawable(android.graphics.drawabl.Description: Set an icon that will be used to represent this route. The system may use this icon in picker UIs or similar.

requestSetVolume(int).Description: Request a volume change for this route.

setVolume(int).Description: Defines at what volume the playback associated with this route is performed (for user feedback purposes). This information is only used when the playback is not local.

Returns: the RemoteControlClient associated with this route
getRemoteControlClient().Description: Retrieve the RemoteControlClient associated with this route, if one has been set.

Parameters: CharSequence: Name to display to the user to describe this route
setName(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the user-visible name of this route.

Parameters: RemoteControlClient: RemoteControlClient associated with this route
setRemoteControlClient(android.media.Rem.Description: Set the RemoteControlClient responsible for reporting playback info for this user route. If this route manages remote playback, the data exposed by this RemoteControlClient will be used to reflect and update information such as route volume info in related UIs. The RemoteControlClient must have been previously registered with @B_android#media#AudioManager#registerRemoteControlClient_E@.

setPlaybackType(int).Description: Defines whether playback associated with this route is "local" (@B_android#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_LOCAL_E@) or "remote" (@B_android#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE_E@).

Parameters: int: Resource ID of the name to display to the user to describe this route
setName(int).Description: Set the user-visible name of this route. The route name identifies the destination represented by the route. It may be a user-supplied name, an alias, or device serial number.

Parameters: CharSequence: Status to display to the user to describe what the endpoint of this route is currently doing
setStatus(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the current user-visible status for this route.

ClassDesc: Information about a route that the application may define and modify. A user route defaults to @B_android#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE_E@ and @B_android#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_VOLUME_FIXED_E@.
